title: Australian diary. No. 029
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
brief_description: This cinemagazine features: The pearl shell harvest at Broome; the development of a school of industrial design at East Sydney Technical College; the manufacture of paper in Tasmania; the Sydney Glider Club.
